description: Take on the cold weather in the Run Cold Weather Targeted Cushion Crew Socks. Featuring our most advanced sock technologies for enhanced durability, breathability, and comfort. Plus, a crew height for a convenient way to add extra warmth under tights. You can go far and feel good no matter the temperature outside with these cold-weather run socks along for the ride.
name: Smartwool Run Cold Weather Targeted Cushion Crew Socks - Mens

specs.value: 55% Merino Wool, 13% Nylon, 29% Recycled Nylon, 3% Elastane
